name: Sludge of Evolution
description:
Game submitted for the Space Score jam. 

Theme for the jam: Merge.

This is the story of a little slime, that found itself in a forest full of dangers and enemies, in a cruel competition for evolution.
Will it survive and evolve to be the best creature?

In this game, you will have to kill enemies and merge with them (by clicking E) to get stronger, and also EVOLVE!

Will you succumb early, or survive to see the late game?

Abilities and Evolutions

Each evolution has different Bullets and Abilities(COMING SOON).

Stage 1: normal bullets.
Stage 2: small area damage bullet.
Stage 3: spread of 3 bullets.
Stage 4: fast, enemy-piercing bullet.
Stage 5: powerful slow, big area damage bullet.

Future of this game

I like the concept of this game (like an Agar.io, but with top-down shooter mechanics), and I may continue it a bit, if it gets enough attention.

There are for now only 5 evolution stages in the game, but I have 5 more ready that I couldn't add because of time limitation.

I also plan on adding 2 Bosses and one more biome, the Desert.

Also, I will surely increase the quality of sound effects and add some Music (maybe in theme with the future biomes). Haven't got the occasion to polish those because of time limitation.

Suggestions and criticisms are always welcome :D

Bugs

The game is full of them, and I couldn't patch them all because of time limitation. I hope you will be able to enjoy the game anyways :)
